devdoc.author: Babylon Finance Executes a lend operation

params._asset: Asset to receive into this operation
params._capital: Amount of asset received param _assetStatus         Status of the asset amount
params._data: OpData e.g. Address of the asset to lend param _garden              Garden of the strategy
params._integration: Address of the integration to execute

params._percentage: of capital to exit from the strategy

devdoc.title: LendOperation

getNAV(bytes,address,address).notice: Gets the NAV of the lend op in the reserve asset

getName().notice: Returns the name of the operation

validateOperation(bytes,address,address,.notice: Sets operation data for the lend operation
